abstract: The entertainment industry, which has for years pressured Google to act against online piracy, applauded the change to search engine’s algorithm.
snippet: The entertainment industry, which has for years pressured Google to act against online piracy, applauded the change to search engine’s algorithm.
lead_paragraph: 6:58 p.m. | Updated Big media companies won a battle in the fight to combat online piracy on Friday when Google said it would alter its search algorithms to favor Web sites that offered legitimate copyrighted movies, music and television.

headline.main: Under Copyright Pressure, Google to Alter Search Results
headline.print_headline: Under Copyright Pressure, Google to Alter Search Results
